missing.radio: The current setup requires that a configuration must be added and checked.

unValid.format: Inconsistent formatting or presence of illegal characters

renderOptimization.label: Folded block rendering optimization
renderOptimization.helpText:
Add contain constraints to folded block elements

contain: layout style;

If your browser is laggy when viewing large numbers of folded blocks, turning it onmayimprove it somewhat

paging.label: Comments Distinction Page
paging.helpText: The comments are displayed on separate pages, with a specified number ofmain floorper page.

luoguJump.label: Show Jump to Rock Valley
luoguJump.helpText:
Some of the Codeforces titles are included on LOGU OJ, some titles have translations and explanations

When the display is turned on, if the current title is included, the LOGU logo will be displayed in the upper right corner of the title,

Clicking on it will allow you to jump to the corresponding LOGU page for that title with one click.

recolor.label: Recoloring the list
recolor.helpText:
For the list of races using the Codeforces system

Recolor the scores according to the range of "Score/Total"

Range：1~0.7~0.45~0 Dark Green→Light Orange→Dark Orange→Red

notice.1:
Help improve the quality of translations

The author is only familiar with Simplified Chinese and English, for all other languages, the scripts and the language localization of the website are done by machine translation (Deepl & Google) and the translation workflow is hosted by crowddin.

If you are happy to help improve the quality of localized translations for a particular language,

you are welcome togo toto help improve it, and your contribution is appreciated!
notice.2:
Helping to improve website language localization

If you think that localization is necessary somewhere on your website, and localization substitution will not cause serious performance problems, you are welcome togo to Improving Localization Rules.

If you want to add a new rule, you need to add the Simplified Chinese version of the rule：fork and modify the rule file, then launch a pull request.

After the submission is merged, crowdin will automatically complete the translation for the other languages, and you can go to crowdin later to improve the quality of the translation for the other languages as well.

openai.name: ChatGPT Translation
openai.helpText:
You need to add and select the configuration information you want to use in the ChatGPT configuration below, and right click to modify and delete the configuration

Please read the script page for details

mode.title: paradigm
mode.helpText: Select the mode of DeepL service, the default is free mode, do not need to provide API, but by the official more frequency restrictions. API mode, you need to add the configuration, you can choose the official API：API free, API Pro, as well as the unofficial deeplx

enableEmphasisProtection.title: Protection** No.
enableEmphasisProtection.helpText:
This option only works if the official API is used in API mode

DeepL may incorrectly handle emphasis in MarkDown **

This may cause the translation result to miss its wrapped content.

When this option is turned on, emphasis in text ** is replaced with HTML tags andtag_handling: htmlis automatically added to the translation request header so that DeepL doesn't break the emphasis and its content

enableLinkProtection.title: Protecting links
enableLinkProtection.helpText:
This option only works if the official API is used in API mode

DeepL may incorrectly handle links in MarkDown.

When this option is turned on, it replaces the link symbols in the text []() with HTML tags and automatically addstag_handling: htmlto the translation request header to keep DeepL from destroying the links and the content therein

target.title: target language
target.helpText: Note：The available translation services vary for different target languages, please read the script page for details.

autoTranslation.title: automatic translation
autoTranslation.helpText:
For short texts in the.ttypography, .comments area

are automatically translated when they enter the visible area of the browser window

shortTextLength.name: Text length
shortTextLength.helpText: When the text length is less than this value, it is considered as a short text

allowMixTrans.name: Mixed translation of the comments section
allowMixTrans.helpText:
When translating automatically, for each short text area in the comments section, independently and randomly select one of the services checked below

Translate in parallel

mode.name: operating mode
mode.helpText:
You can choose how the script works

○ Normal mode：will translate the whole area at once

○ Segmented mode：will translate each<p/>and<i/>tag in the area in turn

○ Selected segmented mode：You are free to click on any<p/>and<i/>tags on the page to translate them

NOTE：Segmented/selected segmented modes cause the following problems：

- they make it impossible for the translation interface to know the whole text in context and reduce the quality of the translation.

- There will besections that will not be translated/cannot be selectedbecause they are not<p/>or<i/>elements

memory.name: Automatic recovery of historical translations
memory.helpText:
Automatically saves the translation information on thetitle pageto the local indexDB

Automatically restores the translation information when refreshing/next entering the page

retrans.name: Upon retranslation
retrans.helpText: Choose whether to 'close old results' or 'put away old results' on retranslation

transWaitTime.name: Waiting Interval
transWaitTime.helpText:
Sets the waiting interval between two translation requests, this setting takes effect globally and is calculated independently for each translation service

Recommendation 200 + milliseconds

Description：ChatGPT translations ignore this setting and do not wait

replaceSymbol.name: LaTeX Replacement
replaceSymbol.helpText:
The script ensures that formulas are not corrupted by the translation interface by first taking out all LaTeX formulas and placing them with substitutions

The probability of the substitutions themselves being corrupted varies from translation service to translation service, please read the instructions on the script page for more information

Note that：Translating with ChatGPT does not require the above actions, and is therefore not affected by this option

For more information, you can go to the script page for more information

filterTextWithoutEmphasis.name: Filtering of ** signs in text
filterTextWithoutEmphasis.helpText:
Some translation services (e.g. DeepL) incorrectly handle emphasis in MarkDown **

This may cause the translation to miss its wrapper, and you can choose to remove the emphasis (this is ignored with ChatGPT)

basics.name: fundamental
basics.notice:
Note：Access to Clist data requires valid login credentials, you have two options：

Fill in below clist.by the official API key,

or keep the clist.by website in your browser logged in (i.e. cookie is valid)

contest.name: Contest Question Set Page
contest.helpText:
Data source clist.by

You need to provide the official API key

or keep clist.by logged in (i.e. cookie active) on your browser

problem.name: title page
problem.helpText:
Data source clist.by

You need to provide the official API key

or keep clist.by logged in (i.e. cookie active) on your browser

problemset.name: title page
problemset.helpText:
Data source clist.by

You need to provide the official API key

or keep clist.by logged in (i.e. cookie active) on your browser

spoilerProtection.title: spoiler-proof
spoilerProtection.helpText: Displayed only when the mouse is moved over the Rating sub-display area

problemPageCodeEditor.label: Add editor to title page
problemPageCodeEditor.helpText: Add Monaco editor below the title page and the code will be saved automatically, providing online code running

isCodeSubmitConfirm.label: Secondary confirmation of code submission
isCodeSubmitConfirm.helpText: Clicking on the title page of the Monaco editor will cause a pop-up window to confirm code submission twice, preventing incorrect submissions.

alwaysConsumeMouseWheel.label: Mouse scroll lock
alwaysConsumeMouseWheel.helpText: When turned on, when the mouse pointer is inside the monaco editor, mouse scrolling will only scroll the content inside the editor

submitButtonPosition.label: Submit Button Location
submitButtonPosition.helpText: Choose the location of the Code Test and Submit buttons

useLSP.label: Using the LSP
useLSP.helpText:
Connect to LSP Server to enable code completion, code diagnostics, formatting, go to definitions, etc.

Support for C++, Python languages

You will need to start OJBetter_Bridge, as described on the scripts page

OJBetter_Bridge_WorkUri.label: Work path.
OJBetter_Bridge_WorkUri.helpText:
You need to fill in the path where OJBetter_Bridge is located

Use either forward slash or backslash

Default path：

C:/OJBetter_Bridge
OJBetter_Bridge_WorkUri.placeholder: Please enter the path, and note that the separator is /.

OJBetter_Bridge_SocketUrl.label: Server.
OJBetter_Bridge_SocketUrl.helpText:
You need to fill in the Server URL of OJBetter_Bridge in your local machine

Default URL:

ws://127.0.0.1:2323/

Note that you usually don't need to change it here, if you need to change it, please be consistent with the default URL format
OJBetter_Bridge_SocketUrl.placeholder: Please enter the path, pay attention to fill in strictly according to the format

staticCompletionEnhancement.title: Static Completion Enhancement
staticCompletionEnhancement.performanceWarning: Note：Too many static complementary rules can affect performance

dev.title: Safeguard
dev.notice:
Note：Normally you do not need to use these functions.

If you are not sure of the meaning of the functions, do not operate them!

notWaiteLoaded.label: No waiting for page resources to fully load
notWaiteLoaded.helpText:
If the loading prompt message always stays at："Waiting for page resources to load" even though the page is fully loaded

you should first confirm if it's a network issue,

if not, then try to turn on the option and head to Github to report the error, including browser version information and operating system information, so that you can analyze the replication.

refreshScrpitCache.label: Refresh Cache
refreshScrpitCache.helpText: The script's localized data is cached locally to speed up loading, with an automatic refresh cycle of one week, and you can force an immediate refresh of the data by clicking Refresh

clear.label: Clear data
clear.helpText: Clearing the local IndexedDB data will clear all data in the CFBetter database, please be careful

inputOrExport.label: Import/export data
inputOrExport.helpText: You can export the current IndexedDB data or import data exported by others

clear.label: Clear Configuration
clear.helpText: Clearing the local script configuration data will reset the script configuration to its initial state, please proceed with caution

inputOrExport.label: Import/export data
inputOrExport.helpText: You can export the current script configuration, or import an already exported configuration

loadingInfo.label: Show load alert message
loadingInfo.helpText:
When you turn on Show loading info, a loading info prompt will be displayed at the top every time the page loads："CodeforcesBetter -- xxx"

This is used to see how the script is currently workingIf you don't want to see it, you can choose to Off

It is important to note that if you need feedback on any loading issues with the script, please turn this option on before taking a screenshot to make it easier to analyze the issue

targetArea.label: Display the range of the target area
targetArea.helpText: When turned on, the range of its target area is displayed when the mouse is hovered over the MD View/Copy/Translate button.

iconButtonSize.title: Icon Button Size
iconButtonSize.helpText: Setting the size of the translation button

update.title: update
update.thanksforDevChannelNotice:
Thank you for joining the test channel and helping Codeforces Better! get better.

For feedback on issues go toGithub

channel.label: update channel
channel.helpText:
You can choose the update channel for the script

Note that the beta version of：is automatically pushed after every commit on Github, so it has not been extensively tested and may have various unknown issues.

Please raise issues on Github and add Beta tags for issues with the beta version

source.label: update source
source.helpText:
You can choose the download source for your scripts and they will all be updated simultaneously.

The beta channel is not supported by GreasyFork.
